channel.title: Apple on 胸毛齐腰
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on 胸毛齐腰

item.title: 苹果之所以为苹果
item.description: 2017年苹果产品发布会上发布了 iPhone X，不过跟引起我注意的是发布会前面的一段录音，是乔布斯生前的一段录音。原文如下： There’s lots of ways to be as a person, and some people express their deep appreciation in different ways. But one of the ways that I believe people express their appreciation to the rest of humanity is
